name: Hot Pursuit
description:
I loved this movie mainly because of Sophia Vergara's lines and delivery. And her laughs...

I like Reese but I am not used to seeing her this way in a movie, but for me there can never be a better Mrs. Riva.(Sophia owns it.)

It was a cute movie to watch. I gave it 5 stars because I got the laugh and chuckle I needed, which is what I expect for a comedy movie.
